Package org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.safra

Class SafraTree

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.safra.SafraTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class SafraTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
This class provides an implementation of the Safra tree [S. Safra, On the complexity of omega-automta. In Proc. 29th IEEE Symp. on Foundations of Computer Science, 1988, pp. 319-327].
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String NAME
    The name of Safra trees.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SafraTree​(FSA a, StateSet set)
    Constructor with an NBW to be determinized and a label of the root of this tree.

      Returns the next available name.
      Returns:

      public void removeName​(int i)

      i - the name to be released

    • hasName

      public boolean hasName​(int i)
      Checks if this tree has a node with a specified name.
      Parameters:
      i - the name of the node to be found
      Returns:
      true if the tree contains a node with the name i

    • hasGreenNode

      public boolean hasGreenNode​(int i)
      Checks from the green node cache of this tree to see if this tree has a green node with a specific name.
      Parameters:
      i - the name of the green node
      Returns:
      true if the tree contains a green node with the name

    • addGreenNode

      public void addGreenNode​(int i)
      Marks a node with a specified name green in the green node cache of this tree.
      Parameters:
      i - the name of the node to be marked green

    • removeGreenNode

      public void removeGreenNode​(int i)
      Removes a node with a specified name from the green node cache of this tree.
      Parameters:
      i - the name of the node to be removed

    • containsNode

      public boolean containsNode​(Node n)
      Returns true if this tree contains the specified node.
      Parameters:
      n - a node
      Returns:
      true if this tree contains node n

    • createNode

      public Node createNode​(Node parent, StateSet label)
      Returns a new white node in this tree with a specified parent and a specified label. The older siblings of the returned node will also be computed.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent node of the returned node in this tree
      label - the label of the returned node
      Returns:
      a new node in this tree with parent parent and label label

    • removeNode

      public void removeNode​(Node n)
      Removes a node and all its descendants from the tree recursively. The older siblings of other nodes will be updated.
      Parameters:
      n - the node to be removed from this tree

    • spawn

      public void spawn()
      Generates children for all nodes and colors all nodes white at the same time. The green node cache will be cleared.

    • move

      public void move​(java.lang.String symbol)
      Moves the tree one-step forward with respect to a symbol.
      Parameters:
      symbol - a symbol in the alphabet of the input NBW

    • merge

      public void merge()
      Removes a state from a node if the state is contained in some older sibling of the node in this tree.

    • shrink

      public void shrink()
      Removes all empty nodes, and if the label of a node is the same as the union of the labels of its children, removes all children of the node and colors the node green. The names of the removed nodes will be released. The nodes colored green will be added to the green node cache of this tree.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

      public int hashCode()
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class java.lang.Object

      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object

      public SafraTree clone()
      Overrides:
      clone in class java.lang.Object
